\n<Beck>What's this stand supposed to be for?
\n<Max>Yup.\. I think I'll start selling some of my bowling
items that I haven't used in a while.
\n<Max>Also...\. I have a favor to ask you.
\n<Max>I know you've been collecting info on enemies...\. could
you give me that data?\. I'm just interested in all of
\n<Max>Thanks.\. Once you get info from all of the enemies in
\n<Max>Actually, nevermind.\. I don't think you'll be able to
\n<Max>Oh hey,\. you actually got info on all the enemies!\.
\n<Max>I don't usually do this,\. but as a thank you gift,\.
I'll give you this for free.
Max gives you his balls.\. (His bowling ball)
\n<Max>Have fun with it.\. Bowl with it or use it as a weapon,\.
\n<Max>Once you get info from all of the enemies in Wells

\n<Max>Oh, do you remember that favor I asked you to do?\. You
can forget about it, I don't think it's really possible
\n<Danielle>Yeah,\. the tornado hit us pretty badly.
\n<Beck>Well,\. Amal, Will, and Allen said they're
\n<Danielle>Wait, Amal?!\. She hasn't come out of that skyscraper
since...\. well, since she came here!
\n<Danielle>I have to go tell the others!
\n<Danielle>Actually,\. they're going great.\. I think the city will
be back to normal soon enough.
\n<Sebastian>Yup,\. he was with Sophia Evers.\. In the
end,\. he wanted to stay with her, though.
\n<Will>Hey.\. So you may have noticed that the
city is completely un-sparkly now,\. or
\n<Amal>Hi Seb!!\. Or should I say...\. NERD!
\n<Amal>Oh, it's great!\. Everyone is back to
normal,\. and I'm not an evil dictator
\n<Amal>But,\. uh...\. did you find my brother yet?
\n<Sebastian>No, sorry,\. we think he's at the Lighthouse
in the clouds.\. We're going there next.
